review_title: Racial favoritism over best interest of the hospital.
pros: Only on-call payout is fare but payout for contract Network Engineer is much less than any other employers.
cons:
It is so unfortunate manager's abuse of positional authority for racial favoritism and playing office-politics at work place and my manager who openly admitted by saying to me: "Every organization has office politic".  I was thinking to myself, is that so in the 21st century!
I reported to HR, CEO, Michelle E. DiEmanuele and I received a letter by saying no evidence for my claim.
I was shunned away from going full time, because I said something a three weeks after the job-interview, that network architect of the hospital isn't so technical in regards to a technical issue that architect could not resolve for 2 months, which I said three weeks after the job interview for a fulltime position, which was held against me, for a technical issue which I came forward to resolve and resolved it successfully.
I could not understand what bearing what I said three weeks after the interview in regards to a true event, would have been a factor, when decision to shun me from going full time was made three weeks ahead of time, but later it was blamed on what I said three week after the job interview.
